alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nuckolls and western Thayer Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nora, or 29 miles northwest of Belleville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oak around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ruskin and Deshler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
